text.listBibl:
REFERENCES
Amurgo-Pacheco, Alberto, and Martha Denisse Pierola, " Patterns of Export Diversification in
Developing Countries: Intensive and Extensive Margins, The World Bank International Trade
Department, Policy Research Working Paper No. 4473, January 2008.
Berndt, Ernst R., The Practice of Econometrics Classic and Contemporary Addison-Wesley Publishing
Company, Reading Massachusetts, 1991.
Brenton, Paul, and Richard Newfarmer, " Watching More than the Discovery Channel: Export Cycles
and Diversification in Development " , The World Bank International Trade Department, Policy
Research Working Paper No. 4302, August 2007.
Debaere, Peter and Shalah Mostashari, " Do Tariffs Matter for the Extensive margin of International
Trade? An Empirical Analysis " , Center for Economic Policy Research, Discussion Paper 5260,
2005
Dennis, Allen and Ben Shepherd, " Entry Costs, Barriers to Entry, and Export Diversification in
Developing Countries " , The World Bank, Financial and Private Sector Development doing
Business and Development Research Group Trade Team. September, 2007.
Fabling, Richard and Lynda Sanderson, " Firm Level Patterns in Merchandise Trade " , Ministry of
Economic Development Occasional Paper, 08/03, May 2008.
Felbermayr, Gabriel J., and Wilhelm Kohler, " Exploring the Intensive and Extensive Margins of
World Trade " , Review of World Economics, 2006, Vol 142 (4), pp 642-674.
Feenstra, Robert C., and Hiau Looi Kee, " Trade Liberalisation and Export Variety: A Comparison of
Mexico and China " , The World Economy (2007), pp 5-21.
Helpman, Elhanan, Marc Melitz, and Yona Rubinstein, " Estimating Trade Flows: Trading Partners
and Trading Volumes " , The Quarterly Journal of Economics, Vol CXXIII (2), May 2008, pp
441-487.
Hummels David and Peter J. Klenow, " The Variety and Quality of a Nation's Exports " , American
Economic Review, (2005), pp 704-723.
Hummels David, and Peter J. Klenow, " The Variety and Quality of a Nation's Trade " , National
Bureau of Economic Research, Working Paper No. 8712, January 2002.
Melitz, Marc J., " The Impact of Trade on Intra-industry Reallocations and Aggregate Industry
Productivity, Econometrica, 71(2003), pp 1695-1725.
OECD, " Patterns in Agriculture and Food Trade: 1985 to 2004 " , COM/AGR/TD/WP(2006)58/REV1,
November 2007.
